query:
-- Adicionar novas colunas à tabela users
ALTER TABLE `users` 
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `password` VARCHAR(255) NULL AFTER `email`,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `provider` VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'email' AFTER `password`,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `emailVerified` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 AFTER `provider`,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `verificationToken` VARCHAR(255) NULL AFTER `emailVerified`,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `resetPasswordToken` VARCHAR(255) NULL AFTER `verificationToken`,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `resetPasswordExpires` TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER `resetPasswordToken`;
